reviews.title: Not a fun time
reviews.text: The job itself isn't hard but it involves a lot of micromanagement, workplace culture does not exist. The benefits of working here does not exist. The salary is not fair and there are no growing opportunities
reviews.cons: Micro-managing, not a fair salary, company culture is non existent
reviews.pros: Small amount voucher to travel on Airbnb

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.text: Loved it very nice to work for most enjoyable job I've ever had very reliable hours . Would clean cabin from top to bottom for next guests they always smiled at the cleanliness work I do

reviews.title: All on your own
reviews.text: While they do all of the marketing for you, and you don’t have to actively try to get guests if you have a good listing, you are often left on your own to deal with all assortments of issues

reviews.title: Productive
reviews.text:
What is the best part of working at the company?
Air bnb is a good company to work for.

What is the most stressful part about working at the company?
Same day check outs and check ins. 

What is the work environment and culture like at the company?
Good I work alone. The commute is the same everytime.

What is a typical day like for you at the company?
Clean and give reviews of past customers stay.

reviews.title: Trop de pression et de changement.
reviews.text: A peine terminé la formation pour un poste ils vous font passer une autre formation pour un autre. Ils changent les objectifs de prime comme ça leur chante. Le vrai point négatif c’est que la grande majorité de l’effectif sont incompétents ou démotivés et ne vont pas jusqu’au bout de leur dossier. On se retrouve très vite débordé à rattraper les erreurs des autres.

reviews.title: It's a very productive place to work with coworkers and a good support team that considers you as family.
reviews.text: Reliable, dependable, and service-focused nursing professional with excellent patient-care and charting skills gained through 10 + years of experience as a CNA. Compassionate and technically skilled in attending to patients in diverse healthcare settings.  CPR certified (current
reviews.cons: Pay ranges from $16 to $19 an hour
reviews.pros: CNA training class was less than 12 weeks

reviews.title: Cada quien es libre de elegir
reviews.text: Cada quien pone en renta un lugar y decide que ponerle. También se decide que servicios ofrecer para una mejor estancia. Es una buena opción para tener ingresos.

reviews.title: Good starting experience
reviews.text: Good place to start, workflows change frequently and the coworkers and the team leaders were helpful. The work itself is a good starting experience for anyone.

reviews.title: Tranquil and leisurely work
reviews.text: I worked for a close families Airbnb, so that's a bonus. Schedule was sporadic but manageable. Pay is fair for the hours (2-3 a day). Overall very relaxed environment.

reviews.title: Amazing place to work
reviews.text: I learned soooo much at Airbnb and it is my dream to return some day. The culture and leadership are great and the work was fun and engaging. I miss 888!

reviews.title: It was a pretty good job that im happy to have done
reviews.text:
What is the best part of working at the company?
The best part was the freedom and opportunity to meet with new people at the workplace 

What is the most stressful part about working at the company?
Most stressful thing about the position was not having the support of the staff at airbnb, at some point 

What is the work environment and culture like at the company?
Great culture that was always welcome 

What is a typical day like for you at the company?
Work hard and relax after work

reviews.title: Missing basic sence of work ethics
reviews.text:
Worst place to work. Do not join at all.. join Expedia or Paytm they have better prospects for their employees and better work ethics..

No working Perks are offered to the employees..

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text:
Very employee centric organisation 
I loved working with the company and was able to learn a lot during my tenure with organization.

The culture is amazing there.

reviews.title: User friendly app, great help for passive income earners
reviews.text: It makes hosting easier, opens opportunities for passive income earners. The app is user friendly for bother the host and the guest.  Reviews are really helpful.

reviews.title: Caring and supportive culture
reviews.text: The company culture is people focused, website employees are supported in every way to do their jobs. Managers are very approachable and supportive of people in their team

reviews.title: Great gig and can work own hours
reviews.text: Can make own schedule and set price to preference for booking. Great support and love the ability to be creative. Can make passive income. Awesome environment

reviews.title: Good people
reviews.text: Good experience, you have descounts for travels and its an international environment because its full of people from all over the world. Also god salary and perks

reviews.title: productive and cultural workplace
reviews.text: You learned so much on how you to manage the hospitality service, and administrative work to attend to urgent matters that can satisfy the client's need.

reviews.title: easy work style
reviews.text:
i am the host of airbnb .Most of the days is workday.i learned how to upload property and how to compete with other hosts.
i like let my property clean and tidy ,because it's can enhance my guests satisfy and happy.
we often need learn the policy of airbnb .
compete is the hardest part of the job .
as soon as possible to earned money.

reviews.title: Great Place
reviews.text: Great company to have a side-hustle with. Company allows for excellent customer service to both the hosts and guests. The platform is excellent, and fast paced.
